div.p: Create, manage, and administer insurance policies. Capture policyholder data, configure plans, and manage the policy lifecycle.
Modify policy terms, add or remove riders, and adjust coverage in response to customer risk appetite with full audit trails.
Track renewals, send automated notifications, and allow policy extension with updated terms.
Automated risk assessment and flexible tariff administration with underwriting rules engine and risk profiling.
Generate customizable quotes with varying deductibles and coverage. Quote tracking and conversion included.
Integrated with digital payment gateways for real-time collections, payment tracking, and reconciliation.
Automated allocation across Facultative, Quota Share, and Excess of Loss programs at policy level.
Multiple reporting channels including mobile, web, and USSD with document uploads.
Guided workflow for validation, verification, and case escalation.
Rule-based automation with manual override and access to policy and historical data.
Real-time status updates to stakeholders via email/SMS alerts and notifications.
Generate payment or denial letters, and automate disbursement through connected platforms.
Analytics-driven flagging system to catch and report suspicious claims.
Trigger recovery workflows per reinsurance participation model with reporting.
Insights into claims volume, frequency, adjuster performance, and predictive metrics.
Manage all aspects of reinsurance accounting and risk distribution:

ul.li: Track reinsurance premiums, recoveries, and losses.
Review reinsurance distribution before posting to the financial module.
Support for Treaty and Facultative endorsements without altering base policies.
Apply and review Maximum Probable Loss (MPL) and Estimated Maximum Loss (EML).
Prorate Facultative placements based on insurer share.
Manage Political Violence & Terrorism (PVT) reinsurance alongside standard policy reinsurance.
Attach policy wordings and survey reports for underwriting and reinsurance reference.
Generate detailed reinsurance slips for tracking Facultative treaty placements.
Handle multiple risks (by location/business class) under a single policy with distinct reinsurance arrangements.
Integrate treaty accounting with bordereaux reporting capabilities.
Enable finance and reinsurance teams to collaborate on payment tracking from one interface.
Automated GL control for receivables and payables to streamline reconciliation.
Accounts Payable: Manage payments owed to customers, suppliers, and creditors. Integrated with claims, reinsurance, and premium refund workflows.
Accounts Receivable: Efficiently track incoming payments with simplified premium collection tools.
General Ledger: Track all financial transactions including payables, receivables, and journal entries.
Financial Reporting: Generate balance sheets, income statements, and cash flow statements for financial health insights.
Bank Reconciliation: Reconcile bank accounts with accounting records to ensure accuracy.
Budgeting & Forecasting: Upload and manage annual budgets and compare with actual performance.
Multi-Currency Support: Manage cross-currency transactions and convert seamlessly.
Tax Management: Automate VAT, withholding tax, and regulatory tax calculations.
Support for cross-currency premium transactions.
Invoice requisition workflow with automatic tax computation.
Payment request workflow that auto-generates Payment Vouchers (PVs).
Petty cash management with allocations and reimbursements.
Batch upload support for JVs, PVs, and RVs.
Auto-reversal and auto-correction of JVs.
Exchange difference calculation and posting.
Year-end processing to transfer net revenue and expenditure.
Support for Unearned Premiums and Translation Exchange Differences.
API-ready for Payroll and Fixed Asset integrations.
Multi-currency reporting and composite transaction processing.
Online payment platform integration (e.g., Mobile Money, Credit/Debit Cards).
IFRS-compliant structure and support for regulatory reports (SDR, FCR, etc.).
Comprehensive audit trail of all system activities with time-stamped logs.
Role-based access control and segregation of duties.
Document attachments to JVs, PVs, and RVs.
